meanings.definition: A unit of volume equal to one-tenth of a liter.
meanings.sent1: I poured one decilitre of water into the measuring cup.
meanings.sent2: The recipe called for two decilitres of milk.
meanings.sent3: The tiny elf asked for a decilitre of honey to sweeten his tea.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room like a decilitre of joy.
meanings.sent5: The decilitre of oil shimmered in the sunlight, reflecting rainbows.
